description: A web application to help improve healthy dietary behaviors.

description: Personal budget tool that generates a 5 year financial plan using data from USDA, and other countrywide datasets.

description: Ask legendary football coach John Madden any question you desire, and he will give you an answer in the form of a football play.
title: Ask Madden Stuff

description: Upload an image and see a pun associated with what's in the image.
title: Pic-A-Pun
